name: Sakura Sweetheart
storyline: Mokomitchi Marron, a girl who grew up with her parents in the bakery. She always wanted to become a pâtissière and eventually became pâtissière-in-training. Unfortunately for her and the people around her, she is incredibly clumsy and keeps making errors during the baking process. Failing at even cracking an egg, she often winds up with the food she's trying to make all over herself.
summary: The twenty-ninth game produced by Winged Cloud and the twenty-sixth game in the Sakura series. It is a yuri visual novel starring the heroine, Marron. It was released in February 2019.
